00053 /* SWI_TBD there is a inconsistence between ril.h and Java layer 
00054  * regarding eHRPD and LTE, use Java layer definition for now */
00055 typedef enum {
00056     RIL_RAT_UNKNOWN = 0,
00057     RIL_RAT_GPRS,
00058     RIL_RAT_EDGE,
00059     RIL_RAT_UMTS,
00060     RIL_RAT_IS95A,
00061     RIL_RAT_IS95B,
00062     RIL_RAT_1xRTT,
00063     RIL_RAT_EvDo_REV0,
00064     RIL_RAT_EvDo_REVA,
00065     RIL_RAT_HSDPA,
00066     RIL_RAT_HSUPA,
00067     RIL_RAT_HSPA,
00068     RIL_RAT_EvDo_REVB = 12,
00069     RIL_RAT_LTE = 13,
00070     RIL_RAT_EHRPD = 14,
00071     RIL_RAT_HSPAP = 15 /* HSPA+ */
00072 } RIL_RAT;
